attributes.action: remove free tattoo removal from the NHS.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
According to NHS figures published recently, tattoo removal in the UK by the NHS is costing the taxpayer approx. £50 million per year. Could this money not be better spent by the NHS on cancer drugs or more pay for nurses?
People who have tattoos are doing so of their own free will and said tattoos do not cause critical illness, necessitating their FREE removal.
